nodes.text: G4-S8 was an R-series astromech droid, manufactured by Industrial Automaton. During the First Order's occupation of the planet Batuu in 34 ABY, G4-S8 was displayed amongst a variety of droid parts upon one of the upper shelves of the Droid Depot in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. It had green and white paneling and a black sensor.
G4-S8 appeared as a prop within the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019.
